message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I propose an initial price of $12,000 for the product.
Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. This is a fair price considering the value to me and your asking price.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In light of this, I am willing to consider your offer. However, I must respectfully decline it. My final offer for the product is $10,500.
